Params: {3: "The lengthy access code provided by Aleksei effortlessly unlocks the Administrative Hall's main gate. Beyond its corridors awaits the spacecraft docking area."}
{3: 'Veronica likely selected this location to confine her human captives due to its ample space and convenient surveillance capabilities.'}
{3: 'A spacecraft hangs high from the ceiling, its black and white thermal tiles glistening immaculately, making this behemoth look more like a meticulously preserved exhibit.'}

{3: "The calamity has left this vessel frozen in time. This space-faring vessel, designed to shuttle between Earth's orbit and Aerospace City, never had the opportunity to fulfill its destined mission."}
{3: 'And the acceleration track, intended by Veronica to function as an enormous cannon, stands ready to propel this hundred-ton dart at near-light speed.'}
{3: 'In the adjacent docking bays, more vessels of the same model stand—each poised to unleash their devastating payload toward the metal flower blooming in the orbital dock.'}
{3: 'Through the dimly lit maintenance corridor, Hanying makes her way toward Hangar 3C.'}
{3: 'The residents of this city—be they humans of flesh and blood or mechanical creations—should never be used as pawns in a bloody bargain.'}
{3: 'As Gray Raven has fulfilled its duty as a mediator, now she can no longer remain a passive onlooker waiting for war to break out.'}
